verses.verse: And in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, ye shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>: it is a day <S%H3117><s%> of blowing of trumpets unto you <S%H8643><s%>.

And ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the ram <S%H352><s%>,
and one <S%H259><s%> tenth part <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>;
and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, to make atonement for you <S%H3722><s%>;

besides the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> of the new moon <S%H2320><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H5930><s%> thereof <S%H8548><s%>, and the continual burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof <S%H5262><s%>, and their drink-offerings, according unto their ordinance <S%H4941><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> ye shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; and ye shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> your souls <S%H5315><s%>: ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no manner of work <S%H4399><s%>;

but ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>: one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H8549><s%>; they shall be unto you without blemish;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>,
a tenth part <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>:

one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H2403><s%> - goat for a sin-offering; besides the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> of atonement <S%H3725><s%>, and the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H2403><s%> thereof, and their drink-offerings.

And on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> ye shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%>; ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>, and ye shall keep <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2282><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>:

and ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; thirteen <S%H7969><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, fourteen <S%H702><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H8549><s%>; they shall be without blemish;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> of the thirteen <S%H7969><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>,
and a tenth part <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the fourteen <S%H702><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>;

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, the meal-offering <S%H2403><s%> thereof <S%H5930><s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall offer twelve <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, fourteen <S%H702><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, for the rams <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%>, according to their number <S%H4557><s%>, after the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>;

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>; besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H2403><s%> thereof <S%H5262><s%>, and their drink-offerings.

And on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, fourteen <S%H702><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, for the rams <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%>, according to their number <S%H4557><s%>, after the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>;

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>; besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H5930><s%> thereof <S%H5930><s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, fourteen <S%H702><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, for the rams <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%>, according to their number <S%H4557><s%>, after the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>;

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>; besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, the meal-offering <S%H2403><s%> thereof <S%H5262><s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the fifth <S%H2549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, fourteen <S%H702><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, for the rams <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%>, according to their number <S%H4557><s%>, after the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>;

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof <S%H5930><s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

And on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, fourteen <S%H702><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, for the rams <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%>, according to their number <S%H4557><s%>, after the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>;

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>; besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, the meal-offering <S%H2403><s%> thereof <S%H5262><s%>, and the drink-offerings thereof.

And on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, fourteen <S%H702><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

and their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bullocks <S%H6499><s%>, for the rams <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%>, according to their number <S%H4557><s%>, after the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>;

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>; besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof <S%H5262><s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.
On the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall have a solemn assembly <S%H6116><s%>: ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>;

but ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: one <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> he-lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish <S%H8549><s%>;

their meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bullock <S%H6499><s%>, for the ram <S%H352><s%>, and for the lambs <S%H3532><s%>, shall be according to their number <S%H4557><s%>, after the ordinance <S%H4941><s%>:

and one <S%H259><s%> he <S%H8163><s%> - goat for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>, besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the meal-offering <S%H5930><s%> thereof <S%H5930><s%>, and the drink-offering thereof.

These ye shall offer <S%H6213><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in your set feasts <S%H4150><s%>, besides your vows <S%H5088><s%>, and your freewill-offerings <S%H5071><s%>, for your burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and for your meal-offerings <S%H4503><s%>, and for your drink-offerings <S%H5262><s%>, and for your peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H559><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
